item.title: AVXL Stock Draws Retail Attention Ahead Of Company’s Meeting With EMA Committee
item.description: On Monday, CHMP included Blarcamesine on its agenda for oral explanations and regulatory review during the session scheduled from November 10 to 13.

item.title: Why Did Tower Semiconductor’s Stock Surge 18% Today?
item.description: The company reported a Q3 revenue of $396 million and an adjusted earnings per share of $0.55, both surpassing the analysts’ consensus estimate.

item.title: Boeing Proposes New Contract To St. Louis-Area Workers On Strike: Report

item.title: Rubrik, AWS Deal Aims To Enhance Cybersecurity With AI-Powered Protection
item.description: The partnership establishes a shared framework between Rubrik and AWS to provide customers with secure, scalable cybersecurity solutions.
